definition: abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: He invited me to play it with the band.
sentences.chinese: 他邀請我吹奏薩克斯管，和樂隊合作。
那鋼琴演奏者兼作薩克斯管吹奏員。

sentences.english: The saxophonist doubled the drum in the band.
sentences.chinese: 那位薩克斯管吹奏員在樂隊中兼作鼓手。

sentences.english: Sometimes she would listen to him playing the saxophone.
sentences.chinese: 有時她會聽他吹奏薩克斯管。
